review: works great, very handy as I've dropped Sat TV to stream only now. The remote is fantastic. Simple, doesn't need line of site to work and the voice search is excellent. Just be careful when you search, a lot of times the remote will take you to Prime video option that ask you to pay vs. streaming something on, say, hulu, that you've already subscribed to.
author: E. Root

review: The home screen was filled with way too much Amazon advertisement. It was over kill and a pain to deal with. Less is more and Amazon should consider when designing there next player. Also needs more customization options to the home screen.  Other than that it preformed well handled all of the streaming apps with no problem.
